text:
Food52 | New York City, NY | ONSITE

Software Engineer - two openings, 1 for backend / lead developer and 1 for frontend / javascript architecture - and we're open-minded to any interesting candidates...

We have a ~12 person team that builds Food52.com and our iOS app.
